content:
Folkart family

1 Leizer FOLKART
 + Feigel
  2x Leibel Hirsch FOLKART           1801-03 - May 6, 1875 #131
    + Fromette NUSSENBAUM            1802-06 - before 1870 (Dawid+Taube)
          married Sep 20, 1824 #36
     3o Feigel Marya FOLKART         1825 #295 - 1826 #234
     3x Lazar Jozef FOLKART          1826 #419 - after 1849
     3x Michal Dawid FOLKART         1829 #270
     3x Izaak Wulf FOLKART           1830 #427
     3x Abraham Eyzyk FOLKART        1833 #234 - after 1890
       + Chana ADLER                 1832 Trzebinia - after 1890
        4x Jakob FOLKART             Nov 6, 1858 #1566
        4o Golde Fany FOLKART        1858 Krakow
        4x Leisar FOLKART            1859 - Jul 11, 1870 #289
        4o Maria Tauba FOLKART       Mar 24, 1860 #2364
          * Aron GAJER               1848 Krakow
               FAMILY LISTING
        4o Ester Nache FOLKART       1863 Krakow
          * unknown BRAND
           5o Frymet FOLKART         Aug 4, 1889 #706
        4x Lazar FOLKART             1869 #546
        4x Nachman FOLKART           1872 #534 - Aug 1, 1873 #472
        4o Frommet FOLKART           Mar 10, 1875 #519 - Oct 31, 1878 #447
     3x Jakob FOLKART                1836 #13
